str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
(a) of time: still, yet, even now, (b) of degree: even, further, more, in addition. Perhaps akin to etos; 'yet, ' still.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: From pros and erchomai; to approach, i.e. come near, visit, or worship, assent to.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An evil-spirit, demon; a heathen deity. Neuter of a derivative of daimon; a d?Monic being; by extension a deity.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To rend, break asunder; I break forth (into speech); I throw or dash down.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To throw violently on the ground. From sun and sparasso; to rend completely, i.e. to convulse violently.

Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

Wind, breath, spirit.

str2: To heal, generally of the physical, sometimes of spiritual, disease. Middle voice of apparently a primary verb; to cure.
